entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story, who is considering a career as an Auror.

entities.name: auror
entities.description: A highly trained wizard whose job it is to find and kill Voldemort.

entities.name: potions
entities.description: A subject that Harry needs to pass in order to become an Auror.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story.

entities.name: death eater
entities.description: A group of wizards who are followers of Voldemort.

relationships.description: Harry is considering a career as an Auror.
Harry needs to pass Potions in order to become an Auror.
Death Eaters are followers of Voldemort.
Harry is opposed to Voldemort and wants to join the Aurors in order to kill him.
